title: "AI is not our future" Campaign
heading: Championing Human Creativity in an AI World
description: Spearheaded a global campaign highlighting the importance of human creativity in an AI-dominated landscape.

content.alt: AI is not our future campaign hero image

content.title: Taking a stand for human creativity
text: In a world increasingly dominated by AI-generated content, Procreate needed to make a bold statement about the irreplaceable value of human creativity.
